name: 3D Printer - Ultimaker S5
description: Professional dual-extrusion 3D printer for rapid prototyping of robotics components.
safetyNotes: Requires safety training. Keep area ventilated during printing.

name: CNC Milling Machine - Haas VF-2
description: Precision CNC milling machine for metal and plastic parts manufacturing.
safetyNotes: Mandatory safety gear required. Operator certification needed.

name: Oscilloscope - Keysight DSOX3034T
description: High-performance oscilloscope for electronics debugging and signal analysis.
safetyNotes: Handle with care. Use proper probes.

name: Robot Arm - Universal Robots UR10e
description: Collaborative robot arm for testing and development of robotic applications.
safetyNotes: Collaborative robot - safety training required. Emergency stop accessible.

name: Environmental Test Chamber
description: Temperature and humidity controlled chamber for environmental testing.
safetyNotes: Extreme temperatures - use protective equipment when accessing.
